---
title: PlistApi.plist_set_date_val method
---

Set the value of a node. Forces type of node to #PLIST_DATE

```csharp
public virtual void plist_set_date_val(PlistHandle node, int sec, int usec)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| node | the node |
| sec | the number of seconds since 01/01/2001 |
| usec | the number of microseconds |
